name: frontfuse-platform
description: Microfrontend hosting platform with runtime Module Federation

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:task-manager"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:shared && npm run install:sdk && npm run install:task-manager
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:sdk && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:task-manager
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:shared" "npm run test:sdk"
scripts.type-check:all: concurrently "npm run type-check:frontend" "npm run type-check:backend" "npm run type-check:shared" "npm run type-check:sdk" "npm run type-check:task-manager"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "npm run lint:frontend" "npm run lint:backend" "npm run lint:shared" "npm run lint:sdk" "npm run lint:task-manager"
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:shared && npm run build:sdk
scripts.security: npm run security:audit && npm run security:sbom
scripts.security:audit:workspaces: concurrently "cd frontend && npm audit --audit-level=high" "cd backend && npm audit --audit-level=high" "cd shared && npm audit --audit-level=high" "cd sdk && npm audit --audit-level=high" "cd task-manager-app && npm audit --audit-level=high"
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && npm run security:fix:workspaces
scripts.security:fix:workspaces: concurrently "cd frontend && npm audit fix" "cd backend && npm audit fix" "cd shared && npm audit fix" "cd sdk && npm audit fix" "cd task-manager-app && npm audit fix"
